title: Kitten War
content: [url=http://kittenwar.com/]This site[/url] is cute. Rate the sweetest kitten! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: Kitten War
content:
Yeah, kittens can be cute, although I have feeling that many just buy them to take some pictures and then throw them away..
Either the way we are getting two kittens this month or the next. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
